snippet: His popularity, even after he criticized President George W. Bush, shows how deeply the G.O.P. misjudged the rank and file’s adherence to conservatism.
abstract: Donald J Trump maintains double-digit lead in South Carolina, despite having taken positions in defiance of Republican orthodoxy, indicating mainstream Republicans may have overestimated voter adherence to ideology; Trump's assertion that Pres George W Bush lied about weapons of mass destruction while leading country into Iraq War has angered some conservatives.
lead_paragraph: His popularity, even after he criticized President George W. Bush, shows how deeply the G.O.P. misjudged the rank and file’s adherence to conservatism.

headline.main: The More Donald Trump Defies His Party, the More His Supporters Cheer
headline.print_headline: Supporters Join Trump Outside G.O.P. Doctrine
